Name: *display
Doc:
The label to be displayed.
This can be formatted if it is a numerical value.

Name: value
Doc: The location of the label on the [min, max] range.

Name: min
Doc: The minimum value of the range.

Name: max
Doc: The maximum value of the range.

Name: format
Doc: The format to use when displaying the value. This uses the printf syntax.

Name: width
Doc: the width, in CSS units, of the indicator (used when orientation is default/horizontal).

Name: height
Doc: the height, in CSS units, of the indicator (used when orientation is vartical).
